text: Lonnie Laffen (July 16, 1958 â€“ December 23, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the North Dakota Senate from the 43rd District from 2010 to 2018. He was a member of the Republican party. Laffen was born in Wimbledon, North Dakota. Laffen died of a heart attack on December 23, 2020, in Grand Forks, North Dakota at age 62. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in North Dakota Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Lonnie Laffen
